connect20/wyomind_realinventory.name: connect20/Wyomind_RealInventory

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/wyomind_realinventory.description: Keep your inventory updated until the orders are shipped. Display your stock level in two distinct columns : one for the saleable remaining products  and one other for the already paid but not shipped products.
